title: Component Connectivity Systems for Military Applications
text:
Print Email Company Details 
HUBER+SUHNER supplies components and systems that deliver electrical and optical connectivity for military operations. 
The company's technicians are experts in radio frequency (RF), fibre-optic, and low-frequency technologies, and have released a paper that considers the benefits of combining these systems to form RF over fibre, RF over GPS, and RF over LAN options. 
To read how these varied solutions can be applied to shelters and aircraft, download the free paper. Available Downloads
